knimeNode.name: Primary Estimation
knimeNode.shortDescription: Try to estimate all available primary models

fullDescription.intro: This node takes an adequately prepared table array as input and tries to fit all of the available primary models to the data. Due to the nature of the nonlinear least squares estimation process, not all of the available models can be fitted. The node returns only the estimated models who converged to reasonable results during the estimation process.

ports.inPort: A table array adequately prepared by the Load Related Data node. See its documentation for details.
ports.outPort: Table array consisting of the tables "GeschaetzteModelle" (estimated models), "GeschaetzteParameter" (estimated parameters) and "ParameterCovCor" (parameters about the quality of the estimated model). These are the newly generated data of estimated models which have to be written back to the database. The output port will most likely be forwarded to the Database Array Writer node.
